DOC.brief_title: Screening Latent Tuberculosis Infection and Observing Preventive Therapy in Kidney Transplantation
DOC.detailed_description: Study the prevalence of LTBI in patients who are waiting renal transplant and monitor the incidence of active TB
DOC.criteria: 1. Age between 2065 and match one of below 2. Waiting renal transplant or status post renal transplant 3. Receiving long term dialysis 1. Not agree to be enrolled 2. Suspected active TB 3. HIV patients 4. Viral hepatitis 5. Using immunosuppressants within 3 months before enrollment 6. Receiving lymphokine therapy 7. Hemoglobin < 8 g/dL 8. Serum bilirubin > 2.5 mg/dL 9. AST or ALT > 2 times of upper normal limit 10. Lactation or pregnancy
